data.subject: Re: Trying to be Asian in America
data.content:
In my opinion, this mom want to preserve the Asian tradition to keep the family together, and when she grow old, she realized that she has been too hard to her daughter, actually she felt sorry about this, so she want to make peace with her daughter.  This conversation ended up with happy ending, it's moved~^^~

At 2010-09-20 18:15:50 greg (高來圭 ) wrote :

Why did she want to bring up her daugher in the Vietnam way in the US?

Did she think Vietnamese practices better than American ones?

Why did she feel she had been too hard on her daughter?

Does  she now think American practices are better?

I don't know if she is good at intercultural communication or not.

What do you think?
